page.title: 13ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: From a survey we found that tastes in entertainment varied between age groups.Teenagers liked discos and pop music while people over fifty tended to orefer the theatre and classical music-ballroom dancing and music recitals were mentioned.Many people go outside of Strathaven to Glasgow,East Kilbride or Hamilton for entertainment.Many people thought that a cinema was badly needed in Strathaven especially for young folk(the last one was not profitable),Teenagers also mentioned a discotheque to give them something to do.Money is being raised for a swimming pool beside the Sports Centre.The old Town Mill has been used as a local theatre for some time now for both professional and amateur productions.Nearby towns provide a wide range of entertainment.
